languages.text: "И помни о своем обещании, элантах — когда мы покинем Лилэтан, то отправимся к далеким звездам. Их узрел в своих видениях Муаран, и пели они скорбные песни о судьбе моего народа. И я буду биться подле тебя и за тебя до тех пор, пока песнь звезд не сменится на погребальный плач".

"And remember your promise, elantach. When we leave the Lilaethan, it will be to go to the distant stars. Muaran saw them in his visions, and they sang mournful songs about the fate of my people. And I will fight beside you until the song of the stars turns into a funeral lament."
languages.original_text: "И помни о своем обещании, элантах — когда мы покинем Лилэтан, то отправимся к далеким звездам. Их узрел в своих видениях Муаран, и пели они скорбные песни о судьбе моего народа. И я буду биться подле тебя и за тебя до тех пор, пока песнь звезд не сменится на погребальный плач".

traits.locale_text: "And remember your promise, elantach. When we leave Lilaethan, it will be to go to the distant stars. Muaran saw them in his visions, and they sang mournful songs about the fate of my people. And I will fight beside you until the song of the stars turns into funeral lamentation."

"And remember your promise, elantach. When we leave Lilaethan, it will be to go to the distant stars. Muaran saw them in his visions, and they sang mournful songs about the fate of my people. And I will fight beside you until the song of the stars turns into funeral lamentation."

"And remember your promise, elantach. When we leave the Lilaethan, it will be to go to the distant stars. Muaran saw them in his visions, and they sang mournful songs about the fate of my people. And I will fight beside you until the song of the stars turns into a funeral lament."

"And remember your promise, elantach. When we leave the Lilaethan, it will be to go to the distant stars. Muaran saw them in his visions, and they sang mournful songs about the fate of my people. And I will fight beside you until the song of the stars turns into a funeral lament."

"And remember your promise, elantach. When we leave the Lilaethan, it will be to go to the distant stars. Muaran saw them in his visions, and they sang mournful songs about the fate of my people. And I will fight beside you until the song of the stars turns into a funeral lament."

languages.text: 「そして、約束を忘れるな、エランタ。我らがリラエタンを去るとすれば、それは遠い星々を目指すためだ。ムアランが幻視で見た星々は、我の民の運命について悲しい歌を歌った。そして、星々の歌が葬儀の挽歌に変わるまで、我はお前の傍らで戦おう」
languages.original_text: "And remember your promise, elantach. When we leave the Lilaethan, it will be to go to the distant stars. Muaran saw them in his visions, and they sang mournful songs about the fate of my people. And I will fight beside you until the song of the stars turns into a funeral lament."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、約束を忘れるな、エランタ。我らがリラエタンを去るとすれば、それは遠い星々を目指すためだ。ムアランが幻視で見た星々は、我の民の運命について悲しい歌を歌った。そして、星々の歌が葬儀の挽歌に変わるまで、我はお前の傍らで戦おう」

languages.text: « Et n'oubliez pas votre promesse, elantach. Quand nous quitterons la lilaethan, ce sera pour nous rendre jusqu'aux étoiles lointaines. Elles sont apparues dans les visions de Muaran, elles chantaient des chants de deuil à propos du destin de mon peuple. Je combattrai à vos côtés jusqu'à ce que les chants des étoiles se transforment en lamentations funèbres. »
languages.original_text: "And remember your promise, elantach. When we leave the Lilaethan, it will be to go to the distant stars. Muaran saw them in his visions, and they sang mournful songs about the fate of my people. And I will fight beside you until the song of the stars turns into a funeral lament."

traits.locale_text: « Et n'oubliez pas votre promesse, elantach. Quand nous quitterons la lilaethan, ce sera pour nous rendre jusqu'aux étoiles lointaines. Elles sont apparues dans les visions de Muaran, elles chantaient des chants de deuil à propos du destin de mon peuple. Je combattrai à vos côtés jusqu'à ce que les chants des étoiles se transforment en lamentations funèbres. »

languages.text: “还有，别忘了你的承诺，外界人。离开莉莱赞之后，我们要前往遥远的星空。穆兰说在幻景中看到了远方的群星，它们传唱着哀歌，诉说着族人的宿命。我会与你并肩作战，直到群星的歌声变成葬礼的挽歌。”
languages.original_text: "And remember your promise, elantach. When we leave the Lilaethan, it will be to go to the distant stars. Muaran saw them in his visions, and they sang mournful songs about the fate of my people. And I will fight beside you until the song of the stars turns into a funeral lament."

traits.locale_text: “还有，别忘了你的承诺，外界人。离开莉莱赞之后，我们要前往遥远的星空。穆兰说在幻景中看到了远方的群星，它们传唱着哀歌，诉说着族人的宿命。我会与你并肩作战，直到群星的歌声变成葬礼的挽歌。”

languages.text: «Y recuerde su promesa, elantach. Cuando partamos del Lilaethan, será rumbo a las estrellas más lejanas. Muaran las vio en sus visiones y emitían cantos lastimeros sobre el destino de mi pueblo. Yo lucharé a su lado hasta que el canto de las estrellas se convierta en un lamento fúnebre».
languages.original_text: "And remember your promise, elantach. When we leave the Lilaethan, it will be to go to the distant stars. Muaran saw them in his visions, and they sang mournful songs about the fate of my people. And I will fight beside you until the song of the stars turns into a funeral lament."

traits.locale_text: «Y recuerde su promesa, elantach. Cuando partamos del Lilaethan, será rumbo a las estrellas más lejanas. Muaran las vio en sus visiones y emitían cantos lastimeros sobre el destino de mi pueblo. Yo lucharé a su lado hasta que el canto de las estrellas se convierta en un lamento fúnebre».

languages.text: "Und erinnert Euch an Euer Versprechen, Elantach. Wenn wir die Lileath-Welt verlassen, dann um zu fernen Sternen zu reisen. Muaran hat sie in seinen Visionen gesehen, und sie haben traurige Lieder über das Schicksal meines Volks gesungen. Und ich werde an Eurer Seite kämpfen, bis das Lied der Sterne zu einem Grabgesang wird."
languages.original_text: "And remember your promise, elantach. When we leave the Lilaethan, it will be to go to the distant stars. Muaran saw them in his visions, and they sang mournful songs about the fate of my people. And I will fight beside you until the song of the stars turns into a funeral lament."

traits.locale_text: "Und erinnert Euch an Euer Versprechen, Elantach. Wenn wir die Lileath-Welt verlassen, dann um zu fernen Sternen zu reisen. Muaran hat sie in seinen Visionen gesehen, und sie haben traurige Lieder über das Schicksal meines Volks gesungen. Und ich werde an Eurer Seite kämpfen, bis das Lied der Sterne zu einem Grabgesang wird."

languages.text: "Sözünü unutma elantach. Lilaethan'dan ayrılınca uzak yıldızlara yelken açacağız. Muaran, görülerinde o yıldızları görmüş; yıldızlar, halkımın kaderi hakkında hüzünlü şarkılar söylemiş. Ben de yıldızların şarkısı ağıda dönene dek yanında savaşacağım."
languages.original_text: "And remember your promise, elantach. When we leave the Lilaethan, it will be to go to the distant stars. Muaran saw them in his visions, and they sang mournful songs about the fate of my people. And I will fight beside you until the song of the stars turns into a funeral lament."

traits.locale_text: "Sözünü unutma elantach. Lilaethan'dan ayrılınca uzak yıldızlara yelken açacağız. Muaran, görülerinde o yıldızları görmüş; yıldızlar, halkımın kaderi hakkında hüzünlü şarkılar söylemiş. Ben de yıldızların şarkısı ağıda dönene dek yanında savaşacağım."
